attributes.action: Remove staff parking infringements at Aberdeen Royal Infirmary
attributes.background: All Staff, including nurses, doctors and surgeons currently at Aberdeen Royal Infirmary can not park freely on the premisses. All Staff must apply through a discriminatory application system for a pass. If a staff member does not adhere to the strict parking restrictions then they encounter a fine.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257548
